description:
At Apache Milagro we are working to a distributed trusted authority that it could be used to be integrated in Apache Mifos providing a safe distributed authentication mechanism.
The task should be to understand the feasibility of a possible integration between Apache Fineract Identity and Apache Milagro DTA and points out an integration plan.

1. The student should understand how the identiy fineract works. Create a small doc.
2. The student should understand how Apache milagro works. Create a small doc.
3. Point out how can the two apis interact for granting roles and access. Create a doc and with the help of the mentor an action plan.
name: Integration study with Apache Milagro DTA
